snippet: “Once Removed: Sculpture’s Changing Frame of Reference” relies slavishly on the collectible and the concept of the collection, rather than exploring the deviating path of contemporary sculpture.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Once Removed: Sculptures Changing France of Reference at Yale University Art Gallery (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: “Once Removed: Sculpture’s Changing Frame of Reference” relies slavishly on the collectible and the concept of the collection, rather than exploring the deviating path of contemporary sculpture.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Once Removed: Sculpture’s Changing Frame of Reference’ at Yale University Art Gallery
headline.main: A Collection of Sculpture All About the Artists
headline.print_headline: A Collection of Sculpture All About the Artists
